value:
$WmMPID_双界リーフ,ch07_02_Leaf_MM_pair,Face|The battle is drawing to its close,
Lord Seliph!$k$p$nMPID_セリス|It is indeed. We must work to keep
our focus until we reach the end.$k$p$WmMPID_聖祭ユリア,ch06_03_Yuria_F_Holy21,Face|I wish you both luck...$k$p$WmMPID_聖祭ラクチェ,ch06_20_Luchtaine_F_Holy21,Face|I need to perform better than before.
Guide my hand, Mother...$k$p$WmMPID_聖祭ナンナ,ch07_03_Nanna_F_Holy21,Face|Now that I'm with Prince Leif,
our victory is all but assured!$k$p$WmMPID_聖祭レヴィン,ch06_16_Levn_M_Holy21,Face|I suppose I ought to play one round,
at least... In the name of those heirs
of the light!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_双界リーフ,ch07_02_Leaf_MM_pair,Face|Thank you for your aid, Lord Seliph.
Your way of knowing what I'm doing
before I do is something to admire...$k$p$nMPID_セリス|We are simply well suited to each
other, as I have always believed.$k$p...$k$p$WmMPID_聖祭ユリア,ch06_03_Yuria_F_Holy21,Face|...You say that almost as if you
regret it!$k$p$WmMPID_セリス,ch07_02_Leaf_MM_pair,Face|I apologize. I had wished we could
show the strength we command
together to our parents, and, well...$k$p$nMPID_双界リーフ|I had much the same thought.
I hope they would be pleased...$k$p$WmMPID_聖祭ユリア,ch06_03_Yuria_F_Holy21,Face|You need not be sad, you two.$k$pAll day, I've sensed a presence
with us, as if someone has been
watching over us...$k$p$WmMPID_セリス,ch07_02_Leaf_MM_pair,Face|You're sure of this, Julia?$k$p$WmMPID_聖祭ユリア,ch06_03_Yuria_F_Holy21,Face|I am. This is a festival praising
the 12 crusaders, of course...$k$pAnd it seems the spirits of those who
inherited their blood's power may
have been called here to the festival...$k$pI believe there was a reason.$k$p$WmMPID_セリス,ch07_02_Leaf_MM_pair,Face|I see... I am glad to hear it. I hope
they looked down upon Lord Leif
and I.$k$p$WmMPID_聖祭ユリア,ch06_03_Yuria_F_Holy21,Face|I am sure they did.$k$p$WmMPID_セリス,ch07_02_Leaf_MM_pair,Face|Mother, Father... I hope to see you
at next year's festival.$k$pI will show you how much I've grown.$k$p$nMPID_双界リーフ|The festival is not yet over!
Lady Julia, shall we explore it?
I saw some enticing stalls...$k$p$nMPID_セリス|Yes, let's go explore. Since there
are so many people, though, try
not to wander, Julia.$k$p$nMPID_双界リーフ|It has been some time since we were
children, you know...$k$p$WmMPID_聖祭ユリア,ch06_03_Yuria_F_Holy21,Face|Hee hee... Of course, Brother, I will
be sure to remain alert.$k$p$Sbs150|
